description.en:
Topics covered during seminars:
- What it means to be a mentor
- How to make a good first impression
- How to bring a mentor group closer together
- How to efficiently pass on your knowledge
- How to keep in touch with your mentees
- How to establish relationships outside your mentor group
 - How to share yout mentorship experience with other mentors
Throughout the semester, mentors meet up regularly with their mentees, giving advice, sharing their experience and helping the mentee through any hardships they might have.
description.et:
Koolituse käigus käsitletavad teemad:
- Mentorluse olemus
- Esimese kontakti loomine
- Mentorgrupi omavaheline lähendamine
 - Teadmiste/kogemuste efektiivne jagamine
 - Menteedega kontakti hoidmine
- Kontaktide/suhete loomine grupiväliselt
- Mentorluse käigus omandatu jagamine teiste mentoritega
Semestri ajal kohtub mentor regulaarselt menteedega, kohtumistel kasutab
koolitusel omandatud teadmisi, jagab omapoolseid kogemusi ning
aitab lahendada mentee ülikooliteel tekkinud takistusi.

objectives.en: The aim of the subject is to provide senior students of computer science, mathematics and mathematical statistics with the skills and knowledge in order to turn them into mentors for freshmen. The mentors introduce the developmental opportunities that the university has to offer and help out with the social side of university life.
objectives.et: Aine eesmärgiks on anda informaatika, matemaatika ning matemaatilise statistika õppekava vanemkursuslastele ehk mentoritele oskused ja teadmised, et näidata esmakursuslastele kõiki võimalusi, mida ülikoolielul on pakkuda tudengi arendamiseks ja erialakaaslastest tutvuste leidmiseks.
